New_Rochelle.Jacobi Medical Center:
Jacobi Medical Center (NYC Health + Hospitals/Jacobi) is a municipal hospital operated by NYC Health + Hospitals in affiliation with the Albert Einstein College of Medicine. The facility is located in the Morris Park neighborhood of The Bronx in New York City and is named in honor of German physician Abraham Jacobi, who is regarded as the father of American pediatrics.
Founded in 1955 as Bronx Municipal Hospital Center, the hospital opened concurrent with the opening of the Albert Einstein College of Medicine.
